page.title: 07Egton Village Hall
page.content:
**{The Village Hall}**
The{village hall}was opened on Saturday 22nd June 1957. The village hall is run by a committee which represents various organisations within the village. Eg Church, Youth Club, Play group.
Funds for the village hall are made through whist drives and other activities. The total cost for heating & rates per year is about Â£1000. It is used on every day of the week for:
{Monday} : Playschool & Dancing class {Tuesday } : Whist drive {Wednesday}: Brownies {Thursday} : Playschool & Youth Club {Friday }: Discos and concerts
